meanings.definition: niffiest: superlative form of niffy, meaning having a strong, unpleasant smell
meanings.sent1: The garbage in the bin was the niffiest thing I had ever smelled.
meanings.sent2: The old cheese was starting to smell niffiest in the fridge.
meanings.sent3: The niffiest socks in the room made everyone wrinkle their noses.
meanings.sent4: The alley behind the restaurant was the niffiest place in town, like a stinky cloud.
meanings.sent5: The niffiest odor from the sewer lingered in the air for hours.

meanings.definition: niffiest: comparative form of niffy, meaning having a slightly unpleasant smell
meanings.sent1: The bathroom air freshener made the room smell niffiest.
meanings.sent2: The wet dog was definitely the niffiest thing in the house.
meanings.sent3: The niffiest perfume she wore was oddly appealing to some.
meanings.sent4: The niffiest scent of flowers filled the garden after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The niffiest hint of smoke wafted from the chimney next door.
